ValidationRule.description: When choosing ACH Loan, prevents users from entering MCA info

AND ( ISPICKVAL(Loan_Type__c, "Fixed Daily [ACH Loan]"),
NOT( ISBLANK( Daily_Holdback_Amount__c )))
